All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents single card in the deck with value and suit.
Card.CardSuit
All possible suits of a card.
Card.CardValue
All possible values of a card.
CardDeck
Represents whole deck of cards.
Dealer
Dealer has a deck and can draw cards from the deck for player and dealer itself.

Game class.

Actions that can be taken in a turn.

Stores the state of the game.

RuWriterReaderInterface
Interface that implements game logic using `Writer` and `Reader` for interaction with the player.
